import React from 'react' import { Card, Image, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import skillsData from '../../assets/skillsData.json' const SkillsCard = () => { const DeploymentSkills = skillsData.filter(item=> item.category=== 'Deployment') const LangSkills = skillsData.filter(item=> item.category=== 'Languages and Tools') const LibrarySkills = skillsData.filter(item=> item.category=== 'Libraries') return( Languages & Tools Tools {LangSkills.map(item=>

{item.name}

)} Libraries Tools {LibrarySkills.map(item=>

{item.name}

)} Deployment Services {DeploymentSkills.map(item=>

{item.name}

)} ) } const styles = { itemStack: { display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', alignItems: 'center' }, logo: { height: '4em', width: '4em', color: 'white', margin: '0.4em' } } export default SkillsCard;
